quote: Heartbreak [10w] Heartbreak’s like a heart attack but without the hospital bills.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The heart was made to be broken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Hope for the Heartbroken A broken heartremains in piecesbut learns to love againwith every fragment.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: For my part, I prefer my heart to be broken. It is so lovely, dawn-kaleidoscopic within the crack.
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it...
author: Nicholas Sparks,  At First Sight

quote: The saddest thing about love, Joe, is that not only the love cannot last forever, but even the heartbreak is soon forgotten.
author: William Faulkner

quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
author: J.S.B. Morse,  Now and at the Hour of Our Death

quote: A break up is the closest thing to bereavement
author: Lindsey Kelk,  I Heart New York

quote: Tears are words the heart can't express
author: Gerard Way

quote: A broken heart in real life isn't half as dreadful as it is in books. It's a good deal like a bad tooth, though you won't think THAT a very romantic simile. It takes spells of aching and gives you a sleepless night now and then, but between times it lets you enjoy life and dreams and echoes and peanut candy as if there were nothing the matter with it.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: A pain stabbed my heart, as it did every time I saw a girl I loved who was going the opposite direction in this too-big world.
author: Jack Kerouac,  On the Road

quote: It was heartfelt, it was heartbreaking. It was extreme joy, it was bone-crushing grief. It was fiery hot, it was icy-cold. It was true love sprouting... it was true love dying.It's like we were both trying to hold onto something that was slipping through our fingers, and we didn't understand why.
author: S.C. Stephens,  Thoughtless

quote: Sometimes, the only soul that can mend a broken heart is the one that broke it. For they are the ones holding all the pieces.
author: Patti Roberts,  The Angels Are Here

quote: You think your pain and your heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read.
author: James Baldwin

quote: After all, you can't truly be happy if you've never known pain. You can't truly feel joy if you've never felt heartbreak. You can't know what it's like to be filled unless you've been empty.
author: Kelly Cutrone,  If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: It is better for the heart to break, than not to break.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not towisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
author: Wallace Stegner,  The Spectator Bird

quote: Nobody think about that broken heart... life goes on, broken heart never join together but it tries very hard to get joined again. That;swhy may be it said "Heart is like a mirror, if its broken can never be joined.
author: Shahid Islam

quote: What barrier is there that love cannot break?
author: Mahatma Gandhi,  The Story of My Experiments With Truth

quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: There's a sorrow and pain in everyone's life, but every now and then there's a ray of light that melts the loneliness in your heart and brings comfort like hot soup and a soft bed.
author: Hubert Selby Jr.,  Requiem for a Dream

quote: Grief is love turned into an eternal missing
author: Rosamund Lupton,  Sister

quote: My heart hurts that means I’m alive.
author: Kazuya Minekura,  Stigma

quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on.
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Becoming hurts.
author: Kat Howard

quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: A love affair with knowledge will never end in heartbreak.
author: Michael Marino

quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Only a struggle twists sentimentality and lust together into love.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Let my heart be broken by the things that break the heart of God.
author: Bob Pierce

quote: Because you let our love just fall apartYou no longer have my heart
author: Boyz II Men

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Love heals scars love left
author: Henry Rollins,  The Portable Henry Rollins

quote: Love hard--forgive harder.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are so many fragile things, after all. People break so easily, and so do dreams and hearts.
author: Neil Gaiman,  Fragile Things: Short Fictions and Wonders

quote: The saddest line you scraped in your diary was not that you cried but those moments when we both shared smile.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: I am heartbroken, but I have been heartbroken before, and this might be the best for which I can hope.
author: Lemony Snicket,  The End

quote: A lifetime of lonely regret or happiness with some pain along the way.
author: Melissa Nathan,  Persuading Annie

quote: I got my heart's desire, and there my troubles began.
author: Lev Grossman,  The Magicians

quote: I wanted to cry because I needed you there with me so bad. I knew in that moment that I was in love with you. I was in love with the way you loved me. When you wrapped your arms around me and held me, I knew that no matter what happened with my life, you were my home. You stole the biggest piece of my heart that night.
author: Colleen Hoover,  Hopeless

quote: You think your pain and your heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read. It was books that taught me that the things that tormented me most were the very things that connected me with all the people who were alive, or who had ever been alive.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Unreturned love is like trying to make a sandwich with one slice of bread. Don’t stress—fold it in half and love yourself.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: She wasn't broken. She was just bent, over the chance of being ignored by the one she loved.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: She knew that what she was going through was nothing special, just garden-variety heartbreak, the sort of thing that poets and novelists had been writing about for hundreds of years, but she also knew, from those same books, that there were people who never recover form it, ones who go on through life beset by a dim and painful longing.
author: Sarah Dunn
